Posts.Content: PROSTATE CANCER. 1st biopsy showed 0.5 Gleason 6 in right apex. Went to Sloan Kettering. Got MRI which shows suspicious area left apex. Got 14 sticks. 2 cores both Gleason 7 (3+4). Rt apex 6 millimeters and 0.5in left. Surgeon said not an active surveillance. Candidate any longer. my choice is surgery or different rads. Free PSA 5.3. Headed to radiation oncologist next week and then back to MSK surgeon.i also received a strong recommendation for proton therapy from a friends brother treated in Lorna Linda. My rad oncology group has such a center 30 minutes from my house.
Posts.Title: What to do
